title: Dish Depicting Turbaned Youth and Persian Poetic Inscriptions
dimensions:
13 5/8 x 2 9/16 in. (34.6 x 6.5 cm)
Thickness of rim: 1/8 in. (0.3 cm)
inscribed:
The inscription reads: "May this plate always bring prosperity; May this plate always be among warm dialogue, May this plate be never found empty; May he who eat [from it] always be cheerful".

The inscription on this plate reads:
"May this plate always be full of wealth
May this plate always be in the midst of warm dialogue
May this plate never be empty of wealth
May he who eats [from it] always be cheerful"
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Horace O. Havemeyer

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
